thread.title: Apple is still blocked from selling the iPhone 16 in Indonesia after making a $1 billion factory deal
thread.title_full: Apple is still blocked from selling the iPhone 16 in Indonesia after making a $1 billion factory deal

author: authorjanjansen
title: Apple is still blocked from selling the iPhone 16 in Indonesia after making a $1 billion factory deal
text:
The tech giant has faced a ban on sales of the iPhone 16 in the country since October having failed to meet local investment requirements.
By: Business Insider Jan 09 2025 97 5101 Views Apple is still blocked from selling the iPhone 16 in Indonesia after making a $1 billion factory deal Apple's iPhone 16 continues to face a ban in Indonesia.Apple Apple still can't sell iPhone 16s in Indonesia due to a ban in place since October. Indonesia's industry minister said thâ€¦ [+2368 chars]
